channel.title: GitHub Julia Daily Trending
channel.description: Daily Trending of Julia in GitHub

item.title: JuliaRegistries/General
item.description: The official registry of general Julia packages

item.title: SciML/StructuralIdentifiability.jl
item.description: Fast and automatic structural identifiability software for ODE systems

item.title: AlgebraicJulia/Decapodes.jl
item.description: A framework for composing and simulating multiphysics systems

item.title: CliMA/ClimaAtmos.jl
item.description: ClimaAtmos.jl is a library for building atmospheric circulation models that is designed from the outset to leverage data assimilation and machine learning tools. We welcome contributions!

item.title: FluxML/Flux.jl
item.description: Relax! Flux is the ML library that doesn't make you tensor

item.title: JuliaSymbolics/Symbolics.jl
item.description: Symbolic programming for the next generation of numerical software

item.title: LuxDL/Lux.jl
item.description: Elegant and Performant Scientific Machine Learning in Julia

item.title: EnzymeAD/Reactant.jl
item.description: Optimize Julia Functions With MLIR and XLA for High-Performance Execution on CPU, GPU, TPU and more.

item.title: julia-actions/cache
item.description: A shortcut action to cache Julia artifacts, packages, and registries.

item.title: TulipaEnergy/TulipaEnergyModel.jl
item.description: An energy system optimization model that is flexible, computationally efficient, and academically robust.

item.title: SciML/Catalyst.jl
item.description: Chemical reaction network and systems biology interface for scientific machine learning (SciML). High performance, GPU-parallelized, and O(1) solvers in open source software.

item.title: SciML/ModelingToolkit.jl
item.description: An acausal modeling framework for automatically parallelized scientific machine learning (SciML) in Julia. A computer algebra system for integrated symbolics for physics-informed machine learning and automated transformations of differential equations

item.title: CliMA/ClimaOcean.jl
item.description: ðŸŒŽ Framework for realistic regional-to-global ocean simulations, and coupled ocean + sea-ice simulations based on Oceananigans and ClimaSeaIce. Basis for the ocean and sea-ice component of CliMA's Earth system model.
